960720.name: RESONANCE OF FATE™/END OF ETERNITY™ 4K/HD EDITION - HIGH RESOLUTION TEXTURE PACK
960720.description:
The RESONANCE OF FATE™/END OF ETERNITY™ 4K/HD EDITION - HIGH RESOLUTION TEXTURE PACK greatly improves the visual quality of characters and the environment. Experience the story of firearms and fate in a further polished, detailed world!
From the title screen of RESONANCE OF FATE™/END OF ETERNITY™ 4K/HD EDITION, select OPTIONS and open the Graphics tab. You will now be able to set the Texture Resolution setting to High.
Please make sure to have enough disk space to install the High Resolution textures. If you don't have at least 3GB of free space on your hard drive, the High Resolution option will not be selectable.
960720.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
